article_text:
Congressional Outlook 2016: Health Care

Law360, New York (February 17, 2016, 10:52 AM ET) -- ​​



Law360's Expert Analysis congressional outlook series highlights key areas to watch during this election year, featuring commentary from law firm public policy practice leaders, academics and former members of Congress.



____________________________________________________________________________



Alan Wheat All eyes are focused on the presidential election and Congress has taken a back seat in the media spotlight, but if you think that means Congress is slowing down, think again. With less than 100 days of legislative business from Jan. 5, 2016, to Election Day, Congress is in a hurry...

To view the full article, register now.

article_metadata.description: With the shortened legislative schedule and so many issues on the agenda, will health care survive in 2016? To answer that question, let’s look at the top 10 health care issues before Congress, says former Rep. Alan Wheat, D-Mo., chairman of Polsinelli PC's public policy practice.
